title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1750.2 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1750.2 - Applicability

State Regulations

These regulations shall apply to State-assisted limited
profit rental or mutual housing companies formed pursuant to article 2 of the

Private Housing Finance Law, and to limited-dividend rental or mutual housing
companies formed pursuant to article 4 of the Private Housing Finance Law, which elect under section
35
(2)
or
96
(1)
of the Private Housing Finance Law, respectively, of such law, to voluntarily dissolve. As used in this Part, the
term dissolution shall include reconstitution where the housing company elects
to reconstitute upon dissolution of the housing company. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
1750.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
